steps.title: Vampire the Masquerade sheet
steps.content: This tour will show off the unique features of the sheet used for Vampire the Masquerade.

steps.title: Sheet created
steps.content: Sheet now created, lets open it.

steps.title: Vampire sheet
steps.content: This is the Vampire the Masquerade sheet.

steps.title: Vampire micro icons
steps.content: Vampire sheets has one extra icons than what is normal.

steps.title: Roll frenzy
steps.content: This icon is used to roll for Frenzy.

steps.title: Unlock sheet
steps.content: First, we need to unlock the sheet to show it off fully.

steps.title: Bearing
steps.content: To be able to add what bearing the vampire has you unlock the sheet then you will be able to change the text. The bonus is calculated automatically and shown.

steps.title: Bio
steps.content: The bio tab is organized as the other sheets and is adapted for the game here you fill in your sect, clan and so on.

steps.title: Generation
steps.content: To set the sheet's generation you just select the value in the box.

steps.title: Lower generation
steps.content: Then if there are need to add temporary generation you just click this icon.

steps.title: Reset generation
steps.content: To reset the generation back to normal just click this icon

steps.title: Combat
steps.content: This page shows the disciplines and rituals the character has.

steps.title: Disciplines
steps.content: As you add disciplines they end up here.

steps.title: Add bonus to Discipline Power
steps.content: If a particular form has bonuses connected to them, these can be added here.

steps.title: Activate Discipline Power
steps.content: A particular Discipline Form can be activated here. It is not until an Discipline is activated the bonuses connected to that form added to the sheet.

steps.title: Show bonus
steps.content: To show the bonus itself you click this icon. If no such icon exist on the row then there are no bonuses connected to this form.

steps.title: Discipline Power bonuses
steps.content: As the icon is clicked the bonuses unfolds into view so you can see them. If the sheet is unlocked you can edit them and/or remove them entierly.

steps.title: Hide bonus
steps.content: If you click on the icon again the bonuses folds again, removing them from view.

steps.title: Paths
steps.content: Paths are seperated from normal disciplines and end up here.

steps.title: Rituals
steps.content: Rituals end up here.

steps.title: Combat
steps.content: The combat tab has one section that are special for vampire.

steps.title: Frenzy
steps.content: If this is checked the rules for frenzy is active on the sheet as you roll.

steps.title: Settings
steps.content: The notes tab has one section that are special for vampire.

steps.title: Bloodbound
steps.content: The existing blood bounds that the character has can be listed here.

steps.title: Settings
steps.content: The settings tab has a few sections that are specially for vampire.

steps.title: Path
steps.content: What path the sheet is to use is set here. The main reason it is set in Settings and not directly on the Core tab is that you change Path extremely rarely.

steps.title: Frenzy
steps.content: If you have some kind of bonus/penalty die on your frenzy rolls, here is where you can add that. This ends this tour.
